SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Interface LogPublisherRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
LogPublisher.PublisherProvider
public sealed interface LogPublisherRegistry extends LogPublisher.PublisherProvider
Registry of publishers. Rainbow Gum registers default publishers with the following schemes:
  • "sync" - default sync publisher
  • "async" - default async publisher
  • "default" - by default this is the same as SYNC_SCHEME.
Plugins may override the above so that the above is automatically replaced with other providers via the service loader.
See Also:
  • RainbowGumServiceProvider

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    ASYNC_BUFFER_SIZE
    Default async buffer size.
    static final String
    ASYNC_SCHEME
    This is URI scheme for the async publisher used by the publisher builder.
    static final String
    BUFFER_SIZE_NAME
    Buffer Size property name.
    static final String
    BUFFER_SIZE_PROPERTY
    Buffer Size Property for Async publishers.
    static final String
    BUILTIN_SCHEME_PREFIX
    Because publisher configurators through service provider discovery can replace the default schemes of ASYNC_SCHEME, SYNC_SCHEME all the builtin core providers are prefixed with this value so that they can still be used even if overriden.
    static final String
    DEFAULT_SCHEME
    This is the URI scheme for the default publisher.
    static final String
    SYNC_SCHEME
    This is the URI scheme for the sync publisher builder to find a sync publisher.

  • Field Details

    • ASYNC_SCHEME

      static final String ASYNC_SCHEME
      This is URI scheme for the async publisher used by the publisher builder. Call register(String, io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider) with this scheme to replace the default async publisher.
      See Also:

    • SYNC_SCHEME

      static final String SYNC_SCHEME

      static final String BUILTIN_SCHEME_PREFIX
      Because publisher configurators through service provider discovery can replace the default schemes of ASYNC_SCHEME, SYNC_SCHEME all the builtin core providers are prefixed with this value so that they can still be used even if overriden.
